## Labor Statistics

A Streamlit application to analyze and visualize labor statistics at the country, state, region, and local level.

<b>Website:</b> <https://labor-statistics.streamlit.app/>
<br><b>Front-End:</b> Streamlit
<br><b>Server:</b> Streamlit Cloud
<br><b>Database:</b> DuckDB
<br><b>Language:</b> Python & SQL
